verses.text: Then \w Nahash|strong="H5176"\w* the \w Ammonite|strong="H5984"\w* came \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, and \w encamped|strong="H2583"\w* against \w Jabesh-gilead|strong="H3003"\w*: and all the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Jabesh|strong="H3003"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Nahash|strong="H5176"\w*, \w Make|strong="H3772"\w* a \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* with us, and we will \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* thee.

And \w Nahash|strong="H5176"\w* the \w Ammonite|strong="H5984"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* them, On \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \add condition\add* will I \w make|strong="H3772"\w* \add a covenant\add* with you, that I may thrust \w out|strong="H5365"\w* all your \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, and \w lay|strong="H7760"\w* it \add for\add* a \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w* upon all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of \w Jabesh|strong="H3003"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Give us \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w days’|strong="H3117"\w* \w respite|strong="H7503"\w*, that we may \w send|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* unto all the \w coasts|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: and then, if \add there be\add* no man to \w save|strong="H3467"\w* us, we will come \w out|strong="H3318"\w* to thee.\f + \fr 11.3 \ft Give…: Heb. Forbear us\f*

¶ Then \w came|strong="H0935"\w* the \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* to \w Gibeah|strong="H1390"\w* of \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, and \w told|strong="H1696"\w* the \w tidings|strong="H1697"\w* in the \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w* their \w voices|strong="H6963"\w*, and \w wept|strong="H1058"\w*.

And, behold, \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the \w herd|strong="H1241"\w* out of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*; and \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, What \add aileth\add* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that they \w weep|strong="H1058"\w*? And they \w told|strong="H5608"\w* him the \w tidings|strong="H1697"\w* of the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Jabesh|strong="H3003"\w*.

And the \w Spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w came|strong="H6743"\w* upon \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* when he \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* those \w tidings|strong="H1697"\w*, and his \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* was \w kindled|strong="H2734"\w* \w greatly|strong="H3966"\w*.

And he \w took|strong="H3947"\w* a \w yoke|strong="H6776"\w* of \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w*, and hewed them in \w pieces|strong="H5408"\w*, and \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \add them\add* throughout all the \w coasts|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* by the \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* of \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Whosoever cometh not \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* and \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*, so shall it be \w done|strong="H6213"\w* unto his \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w*. And the \w fear|strong="H6343"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* on the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and they came \w out|strong="H3318"\w* with \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w consent|strong="H0376"\w*.\f + \fr 11.7 \ft with…: Heb. as one man\f*

And when he \w numbered|strong="H6485"\w* them in \w Bezek|strong="H0966"\w*, the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* were \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*, and the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w*.

And they \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* that \w came|strong="H0935"\w*, Thus shall ye \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Jabesh-gilead|strong="H3003"\w*, To \w morrow|strong="H4279"\w*, by \add that time\add* the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* be \w hot|strong="H2527"\w*, ye shall have \w help|strong="H8668"\w*. And the \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* and \w shewed|strong="H5046"\w* \add it\add* to the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Jabesh|strong="H3003"\w*; and they were \w glad|strong="H8055"\w*.\f + \fr 11.9 \ft help: or, deliverance\f*

Therefore the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Jabesh|strong="H3003"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, To \w morrow|strong="H4279"\w* we will come \w out|strong="H3318"\w* unto you, and ye shall \w do|strong="H6213"\w* with us all that \w seemeth|strong="H5869"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* unto you.

And it was \add so\add* on the \w morrow|strong="H4283"\w*, that \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* in \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w companies|strong="H7218"\w*; and they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w host|strong="H4264"\w* in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w watch|strong="H0821"\w*, and \w slew|strong="H5221"\w* the \w Ammonites|strong="H5983"\w* until the \w heat|strong="H2527"\w* of the \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: and it came to pass, that they which \w remained|strong="H7604"\w* were \w scattered|strong="H6327"\w*, so that \w two|strong="H8147"\w* of them were not \w left|strong="H7604"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*.

¶ And the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w*, Who \add is\add* he that \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Shall \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* over us? \w bring|strong="H5414"\w* the \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, that we may put them to \w death|strong="H4191"\w*.

And \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, There shall not a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* be put to \w death|strong="H4191"\w* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: for to \w day|strong="H3117"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w wrought|strong="H6213"\w* \w salvation|strong="H8668"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* to the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w Come|strong="H3212"\w*, and let us \w go|strong="H3212"\w* to \w Gilgal|strong="H1537"\w*, and \w renew|strong="H2318"\w* the \w kingdom|strong="H4410"\w* there.

And all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to \w Gilgal|strong="H1537"\w*; and there they made \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w king|strong="H4427"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* in \w Gilgal|strong="H1537"\w*; and there they \w sacrificed|strong="H2076"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w* of peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; and there \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* and all the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w rejoiced|strong="H8055"\w* \w greatly|strong="H3966"\w*.
